today_in_history_posts.title: Packaged Transaction Relay
today_in_history_posts.summary:
- The Package Relay Proposal aims to improve Bitcoin transaction propagation.
- Concerns include managing transaction DAGs and the complexity of package validation.
- Discussions covered optimizing package relay while ensuring network integrity.

today_in_history_posts.title: LN Summit 2022 Notes & Summary/Commentary
today_in_history_posts.summary:
- The Lightning Network Dev Summit in Oakland focused on protocol evolution and Taproot updates.
- Discussions included Mini Sketch for efficient LN sync and blinded paths for privacy in payments.
- Future work on LN includes refining channel jamming solutions and improving invoice fetching methods.

today_in_history_posts.title: Is it time to increase the blocksize cap?
today_in_history_posts.summary:
- Bitcoin's scalability issues challenge its use for daily transactions and inclusivity.
- The debate centers on Bitcoin's base layer being reserved for major entities, undermining user autonomy.
- The author criticizes Bitcoin's governance and advocates for a return to its liberty-focused roots.
